def_cn: 拜占庭的；拜占庭帝国的
def_en: Byzantine means related to or connected with the Byzantine Empire.

def_cn: （体制、程序）拜占庭式的，错综复杂的，诡秘的
def_en: If you describe a system or process as byzantine, you are criticizing it because it seems complicated or secretive.
